extendedInfo.description: Defend your planet against hordes of alien spaceships in this space old school futuristic fun action packed tower defense game with tactic elements! Armed with a advanced arsenal of turrets and unique upgrades, there is no end to the many strategies available at your disposal!* Free tower defense game in space stetting!* Perfectly works both on phones and tablets!* Great retro look!* Tons of ships!* Original 8-bit soundtrack!* Lots of turrets! Unique upgrades!* Challenging Levels! Old school!* Superweapons!* 2 game modes : campaign & survival!* Tons of achievements! * Constant updates! * Great support!* One of best free tower strategy war games!* Be true space hero! Have a lot of fun and challenge! Protect your planet from galaxy invaders!If you want new features or updates, please let us know! Thanks for your feedback!What gamers say about the game:"This is how you do a free game. Totally awesome, simplistic but brilliant. Download it, seriously, right now.""Quite fun! An interesting take on tower defense.""Great retro look. Gameplay is fun. Wish there were more levels!""I like to play it very much! Great music and graphics.""If your looking for a decent game that don't bore you than this is it.""Dude you made my 47 yr day better!""I can't stop playing this old school space defense game""Thanks a lot for this funny game :) I played a few hours now and I love it!"Keywords:turrets, upgrades, rocket, war, defense, tactic, spaceship, fun, tower, tower defense, TD, strategy, action, retro, 8 bit, old school

reviews.title: Simple yet challenging
reviews.comment: I love tower defense style games.  Saw mention of this on XDA.  Thought it was pretty basic.  Then played it.  A lot.  It\'s actually pretty tough to finish the \"boss\" levels.  Really enjoyed getting through the first two \"seasons\", hope to see more added soon.
reviews.author: Larry Cloud

reviews.title: Fix this!
reviews.comment: I want to play this game but I have an older LG Enlighten with limited \"phone\" space. These games need to be storable to SD chips from the \"get-go\"... If facebook can make their app storable to sd chips I see no reason why this large app is not the same.its a wonderful game
reviews.author: John Dexter

reviews.title: Unplayable on smaller screens.
reviews.comment: I think this was made for larger screens or perhaps, removing ads could let me play.  Update: I tried installing onto another device. (One with a much larger screen.) This time, it worked perfectly.  Although it would\'ve been perfect if it worked on my Samsung Galaxy Pocket.
reviews.author: Alloy Mendoza

reviews.title: I haven\'t played yet ,but......
reviews.comment: Looks fun and I\'m just commenting because I\'m bored Anne because the reviews say its a plausible game and the description is cool too.
reviews.author: mister sir

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great game, reminds me of an Atari game. I love it!!
reviews.author: Justin Newman

reviews.title: Simple n sober
reviews.comment: Gr8 tym pass, while travelling in Delhi metro
reviews.author: nikhil verma

reviews.title: Pay-to-win if I\'ve ever seen it.
reviews.comment: This game is nearly impossible to beat without buying in-app purchases. And there\'s no way to earn the mines, asteroid, or base health specials without buying them. It\'s enjoyable only so far and I won\'t support such a forced in-app purchasing design.
reviews.author: Leighton Duffin

reviews.title: Good Stuff!
reviews.comment: Simple but addictive. I am always curious to see what ships will come at me next and to see what the next unlocked turret can do. Challenging at times but usually a few restarts and changing your turret setup will do the trick!
reviews.author: Justin Thompson

reviews.title: Old school fun
reviews.comment: Very fun game!! Takes me way back!!
reviews.author: Larry Moskol

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Good game....download it!
reviews.author: Richard Muti

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Great game simple but effective.
reviews.author: Eduardo P

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Fun and a good time killer. Would give it a five but it glitches sometimes.
reviews.author: Dan Reid

reviews.title: Cannot get passed Level
reviews.comment: Ok, so I have noticed that on the HTC One X that there is not a space between the last turret slot and the base.. on every device I played this on there is, ie HTC Sensation, Galaxy Tab 2.7. This gives a MAJOR difference as it gives u more time before the enemy ships hit ur base.. I have paid for ad free and bought additional items, I would like this to be addressed or at least reply giving an answer if this is a known fault................................................................................................................................................................................................................................. Response to reply: I will take a screen shot of my phone playing the game and a tablet and also another HTC phone. I find your response to be very patronizing as if I am not telling the truth!! I wouldn\'t just think of something to diss this game, I actually found playing it very fun!! BTW I completed it just yesterday, when are you releasing more levels?
reviews.author: Neil Baldry

reviews.title: Good but falls short
reviews.comment: If you pay for the levels you don\'t get the ads removed... Also not a lot of bang for you buck... The concept is great though... I\'ll Change my rating to 5 stars if there is more content added
reviews.author: Rafael Prata

reviews.title: I thought it was gonna be boring!
reviews.comment: I was wrong!  Just challenging enough.  Sometimes it is a little tougher.  I love that you\'re able to move each turret!  Fantastic job Developers!
reviews.author: Crystal Hoffman

reviews.title: Simple graphics.....
reviews.comment: But fun
reviews.author: Paul H

reviews.title: Great td
reviews.comment: Great time killer and challenging

reviews.title: Nice td
reviews.comment: Retro loveable game

reviews.comment: Sometimes it seems too hard but good game
